mapper.sql: puid, hour, share_accept AS shareAccept, share_reject AS shareReject, reject_rate AS rejectRate, score, earn, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt
mapper.select: SELECT puid, hour, share_accept, share_reject, reject_rate, score, earn, created_at, updated_at FROM stats_users_hour
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stats_users_hour (puid, hour, share_accept, share_reject, reject_rate, score, earn, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{puid}, #{hour}, #{shareAccept}, #{shareReject}, #{rejectRate}, #{score}, #{earn}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})

INSERT INTO stats_users_hour (puid, hour, share_accept, share_reject, reject_rate, score, earn, created_at, updated_at) VALUES
(#{item.puid}, #{item.hour}, #{item.shareAccept}, #{item.shareReject}, #{item.rejectRate}, #{item.score}, #{item.earn}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.updatedAt})
mapper.update:
UPDATE stats_users_hour
hour=#{hour},
share_accept=#{shareAccept},
share_reject=#{shareReject},
reject_rate=#{rejectRate},
score=#{score},
earn=#{earn},
created_at=#{createdAt},
updated_at=#{updatedAt},
WHERE puid = #{puid}
